page.title: 11Indoor Games, Stickney.
page.content: There are lots of different kinds of games we play when we are at home.I enjoy Monopoly because you get Â£1,500 in paper money.To play the game you use two dice.If you land on a square you can buy the property.If you buy four of the houses you can take them off and buy a hotel.The hotels are red and the houses are green.If another person lands on the property they have to pay a fee of money. Some games we invent ourselves.You can make up good games with toy cars.You can make ramps which cars will jump over.You can pretend that they are on fire and you can get a fire engine and make pretend fire out of cardboard and colour it in red and yellow.You can play stuntmen and pretend they jump the Grand Canyon by putting a ramp up on a cardboard box.
